25# ifndef __BITPIT_LEVELSET_COMMON_HPP__
26# define __BITPIT_LEVELSET_COMMON_HPP__
27
28// Standard Template Library
29# include <array>
30# include <limits>
31# include <unordered_map>
32# include <vector>
33
34namespace bitpit{
35
40const double LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
41
46namespace levelSetDefaults{
47 const double VALUE = 1.e18 ;
48 const std::array<double,3> GRADIENT = {{0.,0.,0.}};
49 const std::array<double,3> POINT = {{0.,0.,0.}};
50 const short SIGN = 1;
51 const double SIZE = 1.e18 ;
52 const int OBJECT = -1 ;
53 const int PART = -1 ;
54 const long SUPPORT = -1 ;
55 const std::array<double,3> NORMAL = {{0.,0.,0.}};
56 const double NARROW_BAND_SIZE = -1 ;
57};
58
59struct LevelSetInfo{
60 double value ;
61 std::array<double,3> gradient ;
63 LevelSetInfo() ;
64 LevelSetInfo( double , const std::array<double,3> &) ;
65};
66
71enum class LevelSetZone {
72 NARROW_BAND,
73 BULK,
74};
75
80enum class LevelSetCellLocation {
81 UNKNOWN = -1,
82 NARROW_BAND_DISTANCE,
84 NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED,
85 NARROW_BAND_NEIGHBOUR,
87 NARROW_BAND_UNDEFINED,
89 BULK,
90};
91
96enum class LevelSetBooleanOperation{
97 UNION =0,
98 INTERSECTION =1,
99 SUBTRACTION =2
100};
101
107enum class LevelSetIntersectionStatus{
108 FALSE=0,
109 TRUE=1,
110 CLOSE=2
111};
112
118enum class LevelSetIntersectionMode{
119 FAST_FUZZY=0,
120 FAST_GUARANTEE_TRUE=1,
121 FAST_GUARANTEE_FALSE=2,
122 ACCURATE=3
123};
124
129enum class LevelSetFillIn{
130 SPARSE,
131 DENSE,
132};
133
134typedef LevelSetFillIn LevelSetCacheType;
135
140enum class LevelSetCacheMode{
141 BEGIN = 0,
142 NONE = 0,
143 ON_DEMAND,
144 NARROW_BAND,
145 FULL,
146 END,
147 COUNT = END - BEGIN,
148};
149
154enum class LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode{
155 BEGIN = 0,
156 NONE = 0,
157 SIGN_PROPAGATION,
158 EXACT,
159 END,
160 COUNT = END - BEGIN,
161};
162
167enum class LevelSetField{
168 BEGIN = 0,
169 VALUE = BEGIN,
170 SIGN,
171 GRADIENT,
172 SUPPORT,
173 PART,
174 NORMAL,
175 END,
176 COUNT = END - BEGIN,
177 UNDEFINED
178};
179
183struct LevelSetFieldHasher
184{
185 std::size_t operator()(const LevelSetField &field) const
186 {
187 return static_cast<int>(field);
188 }
189};
190
194typedef std::vector<LevelSetField> LevelSetFieldset;
195
199template<typename value_t>
200using LevelSetFieldMap = std::unordered_map<LevelSetField, value_t, LevelSetFieldHasher>;
201
206enum class LevelSetWriteField{
207 VALUE = static_cast<int>(LevelSetField::VALUE),
208 SIGN = static_cast<int>(LevelSetField::SIGN),
209 GRADIENT = static_cast<int>(LevelSetField::GRADIENT),
210 SUPPORT = static_cast<int>(LevelSetField::SUPPORT),
211 PART = static_cast<int>(LevelSetField::PART),
212 NORMAL = static_cast<int>(LevelSetField::NORMAL),
213 ALL,
214 DEFAULT
215};
216
217}
218
219#endif
